name: Rootimentory
description:
Control

WASD - move

Space - jump

Story

After you stole the legendary artefact named "Old Root" in an ancient tomb in the jungle, you are now doomed by Noah's curse. Propelled into this parallel world, nature wants to revenge and drowning you, however, vegetation is making plants to grow that make you a chance to escape from your doom. Climbing the heights as fast as you can, you'll finally find a bird nest be like a rooted raft that you use to float on the emerging sea to escape, waiting the waters to recede at the surface.

Credits

Richelle Bourbeau - Environment Modeling

Kennedy Garneau - 3D Modeling & Animation

Clark Prendgergast - Programming

Jonathan Pord - Sound Effects

Florian Dhieux - Music & Story
